entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS Mr. President: please stop spreading mis information. The current death toll as I type this a full day after you posted this malarky is still sitting at under 400,000- NOT the 1,000,000 worldwide that you claim it to be.
Source:https://t.co/G05B92p6mz
